panels.description: Top indices by combined fetch, query, and scroll request rate across the OpenSearch cluster.
panels.title: Top indices by request rate

panels.description: Top indices by combined fetch, query, and scroll latency across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr:
topk(10, sort_desc(sum by(index, job,cluster,opensearch_cluster) ((
  increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_time_seconds{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) + 
  increase(opensearch_index_search_query_time_seconds{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) + 
  increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_time_seconds{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval)
) / clamp_min(
  increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) + 
  increase(opensearch_index_search_query_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) + 
  increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1
))))

panels.title: Top indices by request latency

panels.description: Top indices by cache hit ratio for the combined request and query cache across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr:
topk(10, sort_desc(avg by(index, job,cluster,opensearch_cluster) (
  100 * (opensearch_index_requestcache_hit_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_hit_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}) / 
  clamp_min((opensearch_index_requestcache_hit_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_hit_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_requestcache_miss_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"} + 
  opensearch_index_querycache_miss_number{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}), 1
))))
targets.refId: Top indices by combined cache hit ratio

panels.title: Top indices by combined cache hit ratio

panels.description: Top indices by indexing latency across the OpenSearch cluster.

targets.expr:
topk(10, avg by(index, job,cluster,opensearch_cluster) (
  increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_time_seconds{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_count{job="integrations/opensearch",job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
))
